text: Maa goodou ga daudali nia helekai Dimaadua di godou God, ala e gowadu ko au gi goodou dangi nei, maa goodou ga aloho i Mee, ga daudali ana helekai, ga haga gila aga ana haganoho huogodoo, gei goodou gaa hai digau e maluagina, gei godou hagadili gi muli ga dogologowaahee. Dimaadua di godou God ga haga maluagina goodou i lodo tenua dela bolo ga hai henua ginai goodou.
